# ohwhaley

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of ohwhaley is to summon a whale for a customisable pick-me-up

## Installation

You can install the released version of ohwhaley from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("ohwhaley")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("akansha-kumar/ohwhaley")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to summon a whale:

```{r example}
say("Whale done!")
## basic example that prints "Whale done!" with a whale
```
